LanguageData.Ammo_CannonBall_Round.label: ядро
LanguageData.Ammo_CannonBall_Round.description: A solid ball of metal fired, capable of delivering significant damage on a direct hit.
LanguageData.Ammo_CannonBall_Bursting.label: bursting shell
LanguageData.Ammo_CannonBall_Bursting.description: A round shell, hollow and filled with explosives, exploding on impact and producing razor-sharp metal splinters.
LanguageData.Ammo_CannonBall_Incendiary.label: incendiary shell
LanguageData.Ammo_CannonBall_Incendiary.description: A round shell, hollow and filled with flammable liquid, spreading fire across a small area on impact.
LanguageData.Ammo_CannonBall_Grape.label: Дрейфгагель
LanguageData.Ammo_CannonBall_Grape.description: A canister of numerous metal balls, fired in a wide spread to deal horrific damage against enemy infantry.
LanguageData.Bullet_CannonBall_Round.label: round shot
LanguageData.Bullet_CannonBall_Bursting.label: bursting shell
LanguageData.Bullet_CannonBall_Incendiary.label: flaming shell
LanguageData.Bullet_CannonBall_Grape.label: grape shot
LanguageData.Bullet_CannonBall_Bursting_Mortar.label: bursting shell
